alert.note: Alert for Shelby; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Talladega and east central Shelby Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 345 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alpine, or 7 miles southwest of Talladega, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sylacauga, Childersburg, Vincent, Harpersville, Westover, Oak Grove, Bon Air, Alpine Bay Resort, Winterboro, Alpine, Sycamore, Logan Martin Dam, Logan Martin Lake, Country Club Estates, Sylacauga Municipal Airport, Mignon and Gantts Quarry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
